DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD IN BRIEF ; BURUNDI ; MASSACRE SPARKS TRIBAL FIGHTING
DOC.TEXT: A weekend massacre of more_than 200 Hutu men , women and children reignited tribal fighting in Burundi and brought reprisal slayings of scores of ethnic Tutsis , the government and diplomats said . A government official put the heaviest toll in the capital ' s Kamenge and Kanima districts .
